```{r}
library(readr)
read_csv(filepath, col_types = 
           cols_only(
              uniShort = col_character(),
              prot = col_character(),
              gene = col_character(),
              seqz = col_character(),
              mz = col_double(),
              ppmerr = col_double(),
              svmPred = col_double(),
              ampU = col_double(),
              ampL = col_double(),
              sample = col_character(),
              series = col_character()
            )) %>% 
  as_data_frame()

```
